biotools.summary: The database revolves around the protein structure of catalytic PDE domains and the way PDE inhibitors can interact with them. It contains a systematic analysis of all phosphodiesterase (PDE) catalytic domain crystal structures present in the Protein Data Bank (PDB) with a focus on PDE-ligand interactions.

bioschemas.name: PDEStrIAn
